title: Agusti Pol
text: Agusti Pol (born 13 January 1977) is an <a href="Andorra">Andorra</a>n <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He has played for <a href="Andorra%20national%20football%20team">Andorra national team</a>. His only goal for his country came in Andorra's first international match, a 6–1 defeat by <a href="Estonia%20national%20football%20team">Estonia</a> on 13 November 1996.
